channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- YaySMTP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- YaySMTP

item.title: CVE-2022-2370|2024-08-03T00:32:09.695Z -- unknown -- yaysmtp
item.description: The YaySMTP WordPress plugin before 2.2.1 does not have capability check before displaying the Mailer Credentials in JS code for the settings, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to retrieve them
